eegdash.dataset.DS002720
========================

A dataset recorded during development of a tempo-based brain-computer music interface (OpenNeuro ``ds002720``). Access recordings and metadata through EEGDash.

.. rst-class:: sd-badges

:bdg-light:`Modality: eeg` :bdg-light:`Tasks: 10` :bdg-light:`License: CC0` :bdg-light:`Subjects: 18` :bdg-light:`Recordings: 165` :bdg-light:`Source: openneuro`

     - A dataset recorded during development of a tempo-based brain-computer music interface
   * - Year
     - Unknown
   * - Authors
     - Ian Daly, Nicoletta Nicolaou, Duncan Williams, Faustina Hwang, Alexis Kirke, Eduardo Miranda, Slawomir J. Nasuto

     - CC0
   * - Citation / DOI
     - `10.18112/openneuro.ds002720.v1.0.1 <https://doi.org/10.18112/openneuro.ds002720.v1.0.1>`__
   * - Source links
     - `OpenNeuro <https://openneuro.org/datasets/ds002720>`__ | `NeMAR <https://nemar.org/dataexplorer/detail?dataset_id=ds002720>`__

Quickstart
----------

**Install**

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install eegdash

**Load a recording**

.. code-block:: python

   from eegdash.dataset import DS002720

   dataset = DS002720(cache_dir="./data")
   recording = dataset[0]
   raw = recording.load()

**Filter/query**

.. tab-set::

   .. tab-item:: Basic

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS002720(cache_dir="./data", subject="01")

   .. tab-item:: Advanced

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS002720(
             cache_dir="./data",
             query={"subject": {"$in": ["01", "02"]}},
         )
